popt4jlib
Class GLockingObservableObserverBase

java.lang.Object
  popt4jlib.GLockingObservableObserverBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObserverIntf, SubjectIntf
Direct Known Subclasses:
DGA, DPSO
public abstract class GLockingObservableObserverBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements SubjectIntf, ObserverIntf

base class implementing both the SubjectIntf and ObserverIntf interfaces, with all implemented methods locking on the global "popt4jlib" w-lock. Necessarily therefore, the API notifyChange(subject) calls are not open-calls when the notifyObservers() method is invoked, but instead are protected and execute sequentially via the serialization provided by the "popt4jlib" global write lock.

Title: popt4jlib

Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2015

Company:

Version:
1.0
Author:
Ioannis T. Christou

Constructor Detail

GLockingObservableObserverBase

public GLockingObservableObserverBase()
Method Detail

registerObserver

public final boolean registerObserver(ObserverIntf observer)
allows an Object that implements the ObserverIntf interface to register with this object and thus be notified whenever new incumbent solutions are produced. The ObserverIntf objects may then independently produce their own new solutions and add them back into the process via a call to addIncumbent(observer, functionarg). The order of events cannot be uniquely defined and the experiment may not always produce the same results.

Specified by:
registerObserver in interface SubjectIntf
Parameters:
observer - ObserverIntf.
Returns:
boolean returns always true.

removeObserver

public final boolean removeObserver(ObserverIntf observer)
removes an Object that implements the ObserverIntf that has been registered to listen for new solutions. Returns true if the observer was registered, false otherwise.

Specified by:
removeObserver in interface SubjectIntf
Parameters:
observer - ObserverIntf
Returns:
boolean

notifyObservers

public final void notifyObservers()
notifies every ObserverIntf object that was registered via a call to registerObserver(obs) -and has not been removed since- by calling the ObserverIntf object's method notifyChange(SubjectIntf this).

Specified by:
notifyObservers in interface SubjectIntf

getFunction

public abstract FunctionIntf getFunction()
returns the current function that is being minimized (may be null). The implementation of this function in subclasses should be normally synchronized to ensure memory visibility etc.

Specified by:
getFunction in interface SubjectIntf
Returns:
FunctionIntf

getIncumbent

public final java.lang.Object getIncumbent()
returns the currently best known function argument that minimizes the _f function. The ObserverIntf objects would need this method to get the current incumbent (and use it as they please). Note: the method is not synchronized, but it still executes atomically, and is in synch with the DGAThreads executing setIncumbent(), by locking, as all other implemented methods in this class, on the "popt4jlib" global w-lock, and then invoking the -abstract- method getIncumbentProtected() which is to be implemented by sub-classes, in an instance of the template method pattern.

Specified by:
getIncumbent in interface SubjectIntf
Returns:
Object

addIncumbent

public final void addIncumbent(ObserverIntf obs,
                               java.lang.Object soln)
allows an ObserverIntf object to add back into the DGA process an improvement to the incumbent solution it was given. The method should only be called by the ObserverIntf object that has been registered to improve the current incumbent.

Specified by:
addIncumbent in interface SubjectIntf
Parameters:
obs - ObserverIntf
soln - Object

notifyChange

public final void notifyChange(SubjectIntf subject)
                        throws OptimizerException
when a subject's thread calls the method notifyChange, in response, this object will add the best solution found by the subject, in the _subjects' solutions map, to be later picked up by the first optimizer Thread spawned by this object.

Specified by:
notifyChange in interface ObserverIntf
Parameters:
subject - SubjectIntf
Throws:
OptimizerException
